brand.name: Natura Parquet
brand.description: Premium European parquet - Top quality Oak & Ash

hero.title: Authentic European Wood
hero.subtitle: Premium oak and ash parquet, crafted in Europe with passion and expertise

engineered.name: Engineered Flooring
engineered.description: Our engineered flooring combines the elegance of natural wood with exceptional stability. Made of multiple high-quality layers, it's perfectly suited for underfloor heating.

solid.name: Solid Parquet
solid.description: Solid parquet embodies the excellence of traditional flooring. Its exceptional longevity and the possibility of multiple refinishing make it a sustainable investment.

industrial.name: Industrial Parquet
industrial.description: Our industrial parquet combines high durability with contemporary aesthetics. Ideal for high-traffic areas and industrial-style interiors.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Our team is at your service

footer.description: Natura Parquet - European distributor of premium oak and ash parquet. Quality, authenticity and European craftsmanship.
